p: The pool of WFP traditionally used for food—excluding beverages—in the Catalan linguistic area is constituted by 291 taxa, 278 at specific and subspecific level and 13 determined only at generic level, belonging to 193 genera and to 67 families, according to the information gathered in ethnobotanical prospection from 1659 informants (53.65% men, 46.35% women). The total number of UR is 10,078. Data on scientific names, part of plant used and preparation are presented in Supplementary Materials S3 and S4.
